title: Black Women's Erasure From Social Justice History | Liza Koshy & Michael Tubbs
itunes:title: Black Women's Erasure From Social Justice History | Liza Koshy & Michael Tubbs
description:
Trevor highlights the erasure of Black women activists from history, Stockton, CA, mayor Michael Tubbs discusses "Stockton on My Mind," and Liza Koshy talks about "Work It."
